about_the_game:
Outpost Surge is an immersive hex-based, turn-based strategy deck-builder game set on the rugged terrain of Mars. Players must strategically navigate the harsh Martian environment, battling the elements to expand their outpost as far as possible while managing limited resources and health.

EXPAND RAPIDLY
Play Surge Cards onto a hex-based game board, which spawn into real Mars items and astronauts. Use them to strategically expand your settlement.

MANAGE RESOURCES
Items Produce and Consume Resources per Turn. Stay vigilant to produce net positive amounts, which will get harder as the settlement gets bigger.

TURN-BASED HAZARDS
Hazards damage items on the board and get progressively more powerful as the game goes on.

COMPLETE MISSIONS
Expand your Settlement and clear out dust to reveal Missions. Complete Missions to earn Victory Points.
